RemediationStrings.Title: Zscaler must be connected or be in trusted network
RemediationStrings.Description: Zscaler Connection Client conencted to the trusted network or VPN tunnel is up

RemediationStrings.Title: Tunnel is up.
RemediationStrings.Description: Zscaler must be connected to the trusted network.

RemediationStrings.Title: ZPA is forwarding traffic.
RemediationStrings.Description: Zscaler Private Access (ZPA) serivce must be forwadring traffic to Zscaler

RemediationStrings.Title: ZIA is forwarding traffic.
RemediationStrings.Description: Secure Internet and SaaS Access (ZIA) service must be running and forwarding traffic to Zscaler.
